title: Zimbabwe: Vendors Clash With Municipal Cops
text:
Zimbabwe: ZBC's Gweru Based Voice of Zimbabwe Fires Staff, Shuts Down 
"All vendors should go to designated points allocated to them by the council," part of the notice read. 
"All those who are going to resist the move will be arrested and their goods shall be destroyed." 
Council further advised vendors without designated points to approach the municipal offices to be allocated bays. 
This is not the first time that vendors have clashed with law enforcement agents as in early October last year, they (vendors) threw stones at a council vehicles used in raids by the municipal police. 
At that time, riot police had to be called in to quell the commotion. This was after the council cops and ZRP officers dragged a female vendor who was resisting arrest to a truck. Angry vendors hurled stones at the cops. 
On Wednesday, vendors claimed that they were heavily assaulted by the cops. Zimbabwe
